title: Lachrym√¶ Londinenses: or, Londons lamentations and teares for Gods heauie visitation of the plague of pestilence. With, a map of the cities miserie: wherein may be seene, a journall of the deplorable estate of the citie, from the beginning of the visitation vnto this present. A Christian expostulation and admonition to such as fled out of the citie. ...
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by B. Alsop and T. Fawcet] for H. Holland and G. Gibbs, at the Golden Flower-deluce in Popes-head Alley,
